content.question: (a) Indicate whether <math alttext="Q sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math> is greater than, less than, or equal to <math alttext="Q sub 0" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>Q</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> </math>. Justify your answer without manipulating equations.

frqParts.text: (a) Indicate whether <math alttext="Q sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math> is greater than, less than, or equal to <math alttext="Q sub 0" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>Q</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> </math>. Justify your answer without manipulating equations.

(b) Derive an equation for the charge <math alttext="Q sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math> on one plate of the capacitor in terms of <math alttext="script uppercase E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>∆ê</mi></math>, <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math>, <math alttext="R sub v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mi>v</mi></msub></math>, and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>C</mi></math> when <math alttext="R sub v is greater than R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo>></mo><mi>R</mi></mstyle></math>.
(c) Does the equation you derived in part (b) agree with your claim in part (a)? Briefly justify your answer.

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
